Expression: containsElement(newList('Automagic Startup', 'Manual'), trigger) or global_octodroid_name == null

condition.name: Expression: convertNull(api_getApp, false) or convertNull(api_getApps, false)
Expression: eval

Expression: if (convertNull(value, false)) { setValue(__api_tmp_value, value); } if (convertNull(operation, false)) { setValue(__api_tmp_operation, operation); } if (convertNull(index, false)) { setValue(__api_tmp_index, index); } if (convertNull(indices, false)) { setValue(__api_tmp_indices, indices); } convertNull(api_getApps, false);
Expression: if (global_dismiss_anr == null) { global_dismiss_anr = false; } global_dismiss_anr

Expression: if (trigger == "App Task Started: Classic *") { if (contains(global_debug_package_whitelist, package_name)) { return false; } text = "App task started (Classic)\n{app_name}\n{package_name}"; return true; } return false;

Expression: if (trigger == "App Task Started: Usage stats *") { if (contains(global_debug_package_whitelist, package_name)) { return false; } text = "App task started (Usage stats)\n{app_name}\n{package_name}"; return true; } return false;

Expression: if (trigger == "Plugin Event: AppContext START App(s): *") { if (contains(global_debug_package_whitelist, acpackage)) { return false; } text = "App Context (app started):\n{acapp}\n{acpackage}"; return true; } return false;

Expression: if (trigger == "Plugin: AppContext RUNNING App(s): *") { if (contains(package_whitelist, acpackage)) { return false; } text = "App Context (app running):\n{acapp}\n{acpackage}"; return true; } return false;
Expression: others = newList( "System Setting Changed: Secure enabled_accessibility_services", "System Setting Changed: Secure accessibility_enabled" ); !containsElement(others, trigger)

Expression: package_whitelist = newList( "ch.gridvision.ppam.androidautomagic", "com.android.launcher3.Launcher" ); activity_whitelist = newList( "com.android.systemui.recents.RecentsActivity", "android.widget.framelayout" ); activity_class != "" and activity_class != null and not containsElement(activity_whitelist, activity_class) and not containsElement(package_whitelist, package_name)
Expression: pattern = '(^[0-9]{1,2}:[0-9]{1,2}\\s(?:AM|PM))\\s(\\w*)\\s(.*)'; if (matches(text, pattern)) { regex = findAll(text, pattern, true); return true; } return false;

Script: //*Error: Can not execute disabled flow * exec_flow = split(title, "Flow ")[1]; exec_flow = split(exec_flow, " ended with an error")[0];

Script: _api_keys = getMapKeys(_api_package_info); _api_packages = newMap(); _api_names = newList(); for (_api_k in _api_keys) { _api_name = getAppName(_api_k); addElement(_api_names, _api_name); addMapEntry(_api_packages, _api_name, _api_k); } sort(_api_names);

Script: _input = value; global_lasteval = value; choices = newList( //"Show the result again", "Review the result in a Debug window", "Copy the result to clipboard", "Copy the input to clipboard", "Start over", "Nothing" );

Script: data = fromJSON(response); rtime = data["results"]["sunrise"]; time = getDate(rtime, "hh:mm:ss a"); today = "{getDate(), dateformat, yyyy.MM.dd}"; todaystamp = getDate(today, "yyyy.MM.dd"); global_sunrise_tomorrow = addDays(todaystamp, 1)+addHours(time, 2)
Script: dbot_cmd_prefix = "@bluscream "; author = split(notification_text, "\n")[2]; author = split(author, " ")[0]; notification_text_lower= toLowerCase(notification_text);
Script: dbot_msg_prefix = ":robot: "; device_model = trim(device_model); device_version = trim(device_version); dbot_suffix = "\n\nSent from my {device_model} running Android {device_version}.";
Script: exec_flow = split(title, "Flow ")[1]; exec_flow = split(exec_flow, " ended with an error")[0];
action.script: exec_flow = split(title, "Flow ")[1]; exec_flow = split(exec_flow, " ended with an error")[0];

action.name: Script: frequencies = trim(frequencies); frequencies = split(frequencies, " "); freq = newList(); for (x in frequencies) { x = x / 1000; addElement(freq, x) } freq = replace(freq, "[", ""); freq = replace(freq, "]", ""); freq = replace(freq, " ", ""); //mfreq = "{mfreq, numberformat, #}" / 1000

Script: global_device_model = trim(device_model); global_android_version = trim(android_version); global_octodroid_name = package_info["com.gh4a"]["application_info"]["label"]; global_octodroid_version = package_info["com.gh4a"]["version_name"];
Script: governors = trim(governors); governors = split(governors, " "); governors = replace(governors, "[", ""); governors = replace(governors, "]", ""); governors = replace(governors, " ", "");

Script: if (_api_tmp_image_height != null) { setValue(image_height, getValue(_api_tmp_image_height)); } else { removeVariable('image_height'); } if (_api_tmp_image_width != null) { setValue(image_width, getValue(_api_tmp_image_width)); } else { removeVariable('image_width'); }

") + "

flow.name: Accessibility Guard
flow.conditioncontainer: Expression: trigger == "System Setting Changed: Secure accessibility_enabled" and accessibility_enabled == 0
flow.actioncontainer: Set System Setting: Secure accessibility_enabled to 1
Notification on Statusbar: Attempt to disable accessibility! Settings
flow.conditioncontainer: Expression: trigger == "System Setting Changed: Secure enabled_accessibility_services"
flow.actioncontainer: Notification on Statusbar: Accessibility settings modified! Settings2
Init Variable System Setting: Secure enabled_accessibility_services to enabled_accessibility_services
Set System Setting: Secure enabled_accessibility_services to {_newlist}

flow.name: Billo Discord Selfbot
flow.actioncontainer: Notification on Screen: Discordapp.com is down! (long)
Notification on Screen: Discordapp.com is up! (long)
Script: dbot_msg_prefix = ":robot: "; device_model = trim(device_model); device_version = trim(device_version); dbot_suffix = "\n\nSent from my {device_model} running Android {device_version}.";
Perform Action on Notification on Statusbar: Click notification

Control UI: btn_send = "com.discord:id/text_input"; while (!existsElementById(btn_send)){ sleep(100); } setText2ById(btn_send, dbot_msg_prefix+msg+dbot_suffix); clickById("com.discord:id/send_btn"); back();
Script: dbot_cmd_prefix = "@bluscream "; author = split(notification_text, "\n")[2]; author = split(author, " ")[0]; notification_text_lower= toLowerCase(notification_text);
Execute Command: ping -c 1 discordapp.com | awk -F '/' 'END {print $5}' in
Script: msg = "Mobile Discord Selfbot by Bluscream :joy:"

flow.name: Get sun times copy
flow.actioncontainer: HTTP Request: GET http://api.sunrise-sunset.org/json?lat=-34.0534036&lng=19.6103673&date=tomorrow&formatted=1 store in response
Notification on Statusbar: Next sunrise Notification

Script: data = fromJSON(response); rtime = data["results"]["sunrise"]; time = getDate(rtime, "hh:mm:ss a"); today = "{getDate(), dateformat, yyyy.MM.dd}"; todaystamp = getDate(today, "yyyy.MM.dd"); global_sunrise_tomorrow = addDays(todaystamp, 1)+addHours(time, 2)

Expression: if (trigger == "App Task Started: Classic *") { if (contains(global_debug_package_whitelist, package_name)) { return false; } text = "App task started (Classic)\n{app_name}\n{package_name}"; return true; } return false;

Expression: if (trigger == "App Task Started: Usage stats *") { if (contains(global_debug_package_whitelist, package_name)) { return false; } text = "App task started (Usage stats)\n{app_name}\n{package_name}"; return true; } return false;
